verses.verse: שַׁלַּ֥ח <S%H7971><s%> Cast לַחְמְךָ֖ <S%H3899><s%> thy bread עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on פְּנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> upon הַמָּ֑יִם <S%H4325><s%> the waters כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> after בְרֹ֥ב <S%H7230><s%> it after many הַיָּמִ֖ים <S%H3117><s%> days תִּמְצָאֶֽנּוּ׃ <S%H4672><s%> for thou shalt find

תֶּן־ <S%H5414><s%> Give חֵ֥לֶק <S%H2506><s%> a portion לְשִׁבְעָ֖ה <S%H7651><s%> to seven וְגַ֣ם <S%H1571><s%> even לִשְׁמוֹנָ֑ה <S%H8083><s%> and also to eight כִּ֚י <S%H3588><s%> for לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not תֵדַ֔ע <S%H3045><s%> for thou knowest מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> what יִּהְיֶ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> may occur רָעָ֖ה <S%H7451><s%> not what evil עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> shall be upon the earth

אִם־ <S%H518><s%> If יִמָּלְא֨וּ <S%H4390><s%> be full הֶעָבִ֥ים <S%H5645><s%> If the clouds גֶּ֙שֶׁם֙ <S%H1653><s%> of rain עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> upon הָאָ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> [themselves] upon the earth יָרִ֔יקוּ <S%H7324><s%> they empty וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> and whether יִפּ֥וֹל <S%H5307><s%> fall עֵ֛ץ <S%H6086><s%> and if the tree בַּדָּר֖וֹם <S%H1864><s%> toward the south וְאִ֣ם <S%H518><s%> If בַּצָּפ֑וֹן <S%H6828><s%> or toward the north מְק֛וֹם <S%H4725><s%> in the place שֶׁיִּפּ֥וֹל <S%H5307><s%> falleth הָעֵ֖ץ <S%H6086><s%> where the tree שָׁ֥ם <S%H8033><s%> there יְהֽוּא׃ <S%H1933><s%> there it shall be

שֹׁמֵ֥ר <S%H8104><s%> He that observeth ר֖וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> the wind לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> will not יִזְרָ֑ע <S%H2232><s%> shall not sow וְרֹאֶ֥ה <S%H7200><s%> and he that regardeth בֶעָבִ֖ים <S%H5645><s%> the clouds לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> will not יִקְצֽוֹר׃ <S%H7114><s%> shall not reap

כַּאֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> who אֵֽינְךָ֤ <S%H369><s%> not יוֹדֵ֙עַ֙ <S%H3045><s%> As thou knowest מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> how long דֶּ֣רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> not what [is] the way הָר֔וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> of the spirit כַּעֲצָמִ֖ים <S%H6106><s%> [nor] how the bones בְּבֶ֣טֶן <S%H990><s%> [do grow] in the womb הַמְּלֵאָ֑ה <S%H4392><s%> of her that is with child כָּ֗כָה <S%H3602><s%> so לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> not תֵדַע֙ <S%H3045><s%> even so thou knowest אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מַעֲשֵׂ֣ה <S%H4639><s%> not the works הָֽאֱלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> of God אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> who יַעֲשֶׂ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> who maketh אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַכֹּֽל׃ <S%H3605><s%> all

בַּבֹּ֙קֶר֙ <S%H1242><s%> In the morning זְרַ֣ע <S%H2232><s%> sow אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> זַרְעֶ֔ךָ <S%H2233><s%> thy seed וְלָעֶ֖רֶב <S%H6153><s%> and in the evening אַל־ <S%H408><s%> nay תַּנַּ֣ח <S%H3240><s%> withhold יָדֶ֑ךָ <S%H3027><s%> not thine hand כִּי֩ <S%H3588><s%> for אֵֽינְךָ֨ <S%H369><s%> for יוֹדֵ֜ע <S%H3045><s%> for thou knowest אֵ֣י <S%H335><s%> not whether זֶ֤ה <S%H2088><s%> morning יִכְשָׁר֙ <S%H3787><s%> shall prosper הֲזֶ֣ה <S%H2088><s%> morning אוֹ־ <S%H176><s%> or זֶ֔ה <S%H2088><s%> morning וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> whether שְׁנֵיהֶ֥ם <S%H8147><s%> either this or that or whether they both כְּאֶחָ֖ד <S%H259><s%> [shall be] alike טוֹבִֽים׃ <S%H2896><s%> good

וּמָת֖וֹק <S%H4966><s%> [is] sweet הָא֑וֹר <S%H216><s%> Truly the light וְט֥וֹב <S%H2896><s%> and a pleasant לַֽעֵינַ֖יִם <S%H5869><s%> [thing it is] for the eyes לִרְא֥וֹת <S%H7200><s%> to behold אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַשָּֽׁמֶשׁ׃ <S%H8121><s%> the sun

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> Indeed אִם־ <S%H518><s%> if שָׁנִ֥ים <S%H8141><s%> years הַרְבֵּ֛ה <S%H7235><s%> many יִחְיֶ֥ה <S%H2421><s%> live הָאָדָ֖ם <S%H120><s%> But if a man בְּכֻלָּ֣ם <S%H3605><s%> all יִשְׂמָ֑ח <S%H8055><s%> [and] rejoice וְיִזְכֹּר֙ <S%H2142><s%> in them all yet let him remember אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְמֵ֣י <S%H3117><s%> the days הַחֹ֔שֶׁךְ <S%H2822><s%> of darkness כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> Indeed הַרְבֵּ֥ה <S%H7235><s%> for they shall be many יִהְי֖וּ <S%H1961><s%> become כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> Everything שֶׁבָּ֥א <S%H935><s%> All that cometh הָֽבֶל׃ <S%H1892><s%> [is] vanity

שְׂמַ֧ח <S%H8055><s%> Rejoice בָּח֣וּר <S%H970><s%> O young man בְּיַלְדוּתֶ֗יךָ <S%H3208><s%> in thy youth וִֽיטִֽיבְךָ֤ <S%H3190><s%> be pleasant לִבְּךָ֙ <S%H3820><s%> and let thy heart בִּימֵ֣י <S%H3117><s%> thee in the days בְחוּרוֹתֶ֔ךָ <S%H979><s%> of thy youth וְהַלֵּךְ֙ <S%H1980><s%> and walk בְּדַרְכֵ֣י <S%H1870><s%> in the ways לִבְּךָ֔ <S%H3820><s%> of thine heart וּבְמַרְאֵ֖י <S%H4758><s%> and in the sight עֵינֶ֑יךָ <S%H5869><s%> of thine eyes וְדָ֕ע <S%H3045><s%> but know כִּ֧י <S%H3588><s%> for עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> for all אֵ֛לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these יְבִֽיאֲךָ֥ <S%H935><s%> will bring הָאֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> thou that for all these [things] God בַּמִּשְׁפָּֽט׃ <S%H4941><s%> thee into judgment

וְהָסֵ֥ר <S%H5493><s%> Therefore remove כַּ֙עַס֙ <S%H3708><s%> sorrow מִלִּבֶּ֔ךָ <S%H3820><s%> from thy heart וְהַעֲבֵ֥ר <S%H5674><s%> and put away רָעָ֖ה <S%H7451><s%> evil מִבְּשָׂרֶ֑ךָ <S%H1320><s%> from thy flesh כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> because הַיַּלְד֥וּת <S%H3208><s%> for childhood וְהַֽשַּׁחֲר֖וּת <S%H7839><s%> and youth הָֽבֶל׃ <S%H1892><s%> [are] vanity
